entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Web app fails to load when waiting asynchronously inside an IHostedService #58578
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #58576
  • Set content-type to `application/problem+json` for generic TypedResults with T=ProblemDetails #58574
  • Blazor Templates That Support WebAuthN (Passkeys) #58571
    Backlog
  • Natural culture give wrong ui date format in Windows server 2022/2019 #58564
  • Perf regression: json, json, plaintext #58563
  • Add support in Kestrel to configure signature algorithms and cipher suites on a per-SNI basis. #58560
  • Expose AspNetCore.Components.Routing.NavLink Active State to ChildContent #58559
    Backlog

Closed

  • SignalR in Electron not working #58545
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #58562
  • JDK zip not found when running `.\eng\scripts\InstallJdk.ps1` #58457
  • Allow ::deep selector in other file types. #58572
  • Customise validation css class names #58570
  • HOT RELOAD ALWAYS BREAKING #58528
  • FluentCheckbox / InputCheckbox not be able to render correctly with @bind- attributes when unsafe-eval is not part of the Content Security Policy #58322
  • SignalR callbacks working on net7.0, not on net9.0 #58485

PullRequests

Created

  • if actual bytes to be written is negative, set to zero #58575
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/9.0] Prevent unnecessary debugger stops for user-unhandled exceptions in Blazor apps with Just My Code enabled #58573
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 9.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Test on CentOS 7, not RedHat 7 #58561
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Update `HtmlAttributePropertyHelper` to correctly follow the `MetadataUpdateHandlerAttribute` contract #58558
    feature-hot-reload, area-ui-rendering, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix InstallJdk script #58557
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add scope for internal npm packages #58512
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • [s390x] Fix Extensions.ApiDescription.Client tests on s390x #58235
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] #58218
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • Fix for: Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #58251
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • Rename SourceBuildUseMonoRuntime property, which is not SB specific #58035
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • use nameof for CallerArgumentExpression #58514
    community-contribution, area-networking
